duration_in_months: The estimated time duration is not specified. Work is to be completed within 53 weeks after contract award. Therefore, work duration could be around 9 months approximately.
full_summary:
# EP941-230532 SFB AHU Replacement Tender Invitation
=====================================================

**Reference Number:** WS3615573846-Doc3704140177

**Publication Date:** October 13, 2022

## Overview

A Request for Proposal (RFP) is being issued to select a contractor to replace the Supply and Commissioning of replacement Air Handling Units (AHUs) for various offices across the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Notice Details

* **Procurement Category:** CNST
* **UNSPSC Code:** 81101513 - Building construction management
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entities:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contact Information:**
    + Gillian Fenwick2
    + Email: [gillian.fenwick2@tPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA](mailto:gillian.fenwick2@tPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA)

## Submittal Details

* **Tender Closing Date:** December 22, 2022 at 14:00 HNE
* **Submission Documents:** All required supporting documentation must be submitted by the Tender Closing Date. Late submissions will be deemed non-responsive.
* **Scheduled Contract Dates:**
    + Contract Award Date: To be determined
    + Expected Contract Start Date: To be determined
    + Expected Contract End Date: December 1, 2023

## Mandatory Security Requirement

A valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) at the “reliability status” level shall be held by the Bidder at the time of bid closing. Failure to comply with this requirement will render the Bid non-compliant.

## Important Reminders

* Enquiries regarding this bid solicitation must be directed only to the Contracting Authority through the Event Messages within SAP Ariba.
* All questions and inquiries must be received no later than 5 business days prior to the Tender Closing Date.
